title: Interdisciplinary Environmental Education Design: Integrated Learning for a Sustainable Future

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational science and social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: A blended course analyzing environmental issues from multidisciplinary perspectives, emphasizing problem-solving skills through theory-practice linked projects.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the social and scientific impacts of environmental change from an interdisciplinary perspective
Learners can propose solutions to environmental problems by integrating perspectives from other disciplines such as history, economics, and engineering
Learners can design and present personal and collective action plans to address the climate crisis

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)
Access to online databases related to local environmental issues

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
